abstract: Paul Allen, a private investor and co-founder of Microsoft, has been told he has non-Hodgkin’s lymphoma, according to an e-mail message sent to employees of his investment firm, Vulcan.
snippet: Paul Allen, a private investor and co-founder of Microsoft, has been told he has non-Hodgkin’s lymphoma, according to an e-mail message sent to employees of his investment firm, Vulcan.
lead_paragraph: Paul Allen, a private investor and co-founder of Microsoft, has been told he has non-Hodgkin’s lymphoma, according to an e-mail message sent to employees of his investment firm, Vulcan.

headline.main: Paul Allen, a Co-Founder of Microsoft, Has Lymphoma
